name: Towers 2
description:
This is my first game made using Unity. It's a top-down retro shooter with gauntlet vibes. 

Collect the most points and try to find the exit.

Controls:

Currently I have only added controls for a control pad. 

left stick:  move

right stick:  aim your wand

hold the right trigger: to fire

(Keyboard and Mouse controls coming soon...)
